document.full_text: navy secretary ray mabus on monday said he had set up a special review team to investigate procurement practices after a navy acquisition official and the owner of a small technology firm were indicted for an alleged $10 million kickback scheme.
document.title: navy sets special review team to avert fraud
lines_and_colors: navy secretary ray mabus on monday said he had set up a special review team to investigate procurement practices after a navy acquisition official and the owner of a small technology firm were indicted for an alleged $10 million kickback scheme.
